title: What is the font used by the Fox Network
content:
I'm sure this has been asked and answered - But I don't see a search function within the forum. If anybody knows I'd appreciate it -

AND/OR  
THE CLOSEST font one can get to it?

I'm sure you all know what it looks like - but I've attached the logo in a .doc

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Fox Logo.doc](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324002837/http:/typophile.com/files/Fox%20Logo.doc) | 25 KB |
author: sathyme

comments.content:
Hi Florian - Am I missing something? - I'm looking for the font name?  
I've already attached the same logo to my post

sathyme, your attachment wasn’t a proper image (.doc).  
Florian was just trying to do you a favor.
Once upon a time there was a topic about this logo. IIRC it was decided that it was custom.
